channel.title: How do I make myself owner on rscalifornia v2?
channel.description: Please some help me... I change all in commands.java and in player.java, when i compiled... In game i tip ::admin , but mine ranks still is player.

item.title: How do I make myself owner on rscalifornia v2?
item.dc:creator: @dragnnight0 dragnnight0
item.description:
@dragnnight0 wrote:

a little more info be helpful like is it a 317 508 525 562 600+?

try this go to in your source folder data/characters or data/saved games

and see if you can edit your character file if you can open it with word pad and do ctrl f and search for player rights or just rights and change it from 0 to 2 that’s admin

0= player
1= Mod
2=Admin

or if you cant open the character file go into your source files go to the folder src and find a file called actionsender.java and look for a code something like this

public static void loginResponse(Player player) { player.getAppearance().resetAppearence(); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("dragnnight")) player.getDefinition().setRights(2); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("zbucu")) player.getDefinition().setRights(2); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("andrew")) player.getDefinition().setRights(2); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("")) player.getDefinition().setRights(1); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("")) player.getDefinition().setRights(1);

and that is how you make your self admin if you need any more help i will try and help you

Read full topic
